DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Study Document Submitted and Randomized Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Yes/No indicator of whether clinical trial documentation for the site has been submitted and randomized.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clinical Study Document Submission And Randomization
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research._A physical object, or electronic counterpart, that is characterized by containing writing which is meant to be human-readable.:The act of referring for judgment or consideration by others; the act of handing over something._An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence._The allocation of individuals to groups by chance, especially in order to control the variables in an experiment.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, mechanism of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiology, behavior and health services research. :A writing that contains information.

Concepts.definition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.
A physical object, or electronic counterpart, that is characterized by containing writing which is meant to be human-readable.

Property.preferredDefinition: The act of referring for judgment or consideration by others; the act of handing over something._An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence._The allocation of individuals to groups by chance, especially in order to control the variables in an experiment.

Concepts.definition: The act of referring for judgment or consideration by others; the act of handing over something.
An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.
The allocation of individuals to groups by chance, especially in order to control the variables in an experiment.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
